mapper.select: SELECT f.id as folderId, f.name as folderName, f.team_id as teamId, t.name as teamName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN team t ON f.team_id = t.id WHERE f.team_id = #{teamId};
SELECT f.id as folderId, f.name as folderName, f.team_id as teamId, t.name as teamName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN team t ON f.team_id = t.id WHERE f.id != 1;
